title: Student Handbook 2026: Massive Updates!
excerpt: New Minors (GenAI, Cloud), Alumni Cards, Advanced Certificates, and Re-entry exams. We break down the 70-page changes in the Sep 2025 Student Handbook.
content:
1. New 'Minors' Announced

The degree level just got exciting! You can now earn specific Minors by completing a set of 3 courses. New options include:

  • Generative AI: LLMs + Deep Learning Practice + Math for GenAI.
  • Cloud Computing for AI: DLP + Intro to Big Data + MLOps.
  • Algorithmic Decision Making: RL + Algorithms for DS + Sequential Decision Making.

2. The 'Advanced Certificate'

Stuck at the Diploma level because of Projects? Good news! If you finish all 6 theory courses but miss the projects, you now get an Advanced Certificate (e.g., 'Advanced Certificate in/ Machine Learning and Data Science').

3. Alumni Status & Benefits

Graduating? You become a full IITM Alumnus! Fees are ₹7080 (paid in installments). Benefits include Library Access, Gymkhana Membership, Guest House Booking, and global networking.

4. Re-Entry Policy

Exited with a Diploma but want to come back? You can! But you must pass 'Re-admission Exams' (Format: End Term).
Example: To rejoin BS from Diploma DS, you must pass MLT and MLP exams.

5. OPPE & Grading

System Compatibility Test (SCT) is now strictly MANDATORY. Miss it, and you miss the OPPE. Also, check the new grading formulas—some courses have capped Assignment weightage to 10%.
author: Admin

title: Sep 2025 Term Grading Policy: Declassified
excerpt: The official grading policy document for Sep 2025 is out! Key highlights: OPPE dates are set, SCT is mandatory, and course-specific grading formulas have been updated. We break down the complex math for you.
content:
The Schedule is Out

Mark your calendars! The major exam dates for the Sep 2025 term are confirmed:

  • Quiz 1: Oct 26, 2025
  • Quiz 2: Nov 23, 2025
  • End Term: Dec 21, 2025

Important Policy Changes

OPPE Eligibility: Completing the System Compatibility Test (SCT) is MANDATORY. Do not skip this, or you will be barred from the OPPE.

Grading Formulas: We noticed a shift in weightage for Python and Java. The GA (Graded Assignment) component has been capped at 10%, putting more pressure on the OPPEs. Make sure you practice coding daily.
author: Admin

title: Qualifier Exam 101: How to Crack It
excerpt: The first hurdle. Here is how to clear the Qualifier Exam with flying colors and zero stress. Focus on the 4 core subjects and manage your time.
content:
1. The Four Pillars

Math 1, Stats 1, Computational Thinking, and English 1. These are your targets.

2. The Secret Sauce

Do NOT skip the activity questions. They are often direct indicators of exam questions.

3. Mock Tests

The mock tests released 1 week before the exam are gold. Solve them in a timed environment.

4. Resources

Check out We4AI and Let's Learn for specialized prep material.
author: Qualifier_Vet
